description:
I'll describe how we are supporting the open-source community through grantmaking, software development, and collaboration, including both domain-specific tools and cross-cutting foundational infrastructure.
See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC

title: Supporting Open Source Software for Science | SciPy 2019 | J. Freeman, N. Sofroniew
